item.title: The Art of Consistency - Creating an inhouse style guide
item.description:
Description

For any business thatâ€™s producing a lot of documentation from a lot of hands, a style guide is a necessity. It can provide consistent quality across documents, and over time it can lift the writing standard within your organisation.

This talk will aim to cover:

  • What does your style guide need to contain?
